news_header: Konecranes' operating profit rose to EUR 146 million, with net sales up 5.5% to EUR 1,213 million and new orders totaling EUR 1,166.5 million.
news_text: Konecranes, a lifting equipment manufacturer, reported an increase in operating profit from October to December, reaching EUR 146 million compared to EUR 122 million the previous year. Net sales rose by 5.5% to EUR 1,213 million, and the company received a quarter more orders than last year, totaling EUR 1,166.5 million compared to EUR 926 million. The company is optimistic about the prospects for the beginning of the year.
